## CompMulNode class

Component-wise multiplication with scalar support

**Signature:**

```typescript
declare class CompMulNode extends GenericMathNode 
```
**Extends:** [GenericMathNode](doc/markdown/./scene.genericmathnode.md)

## Remarks

Returns a \* b for each component. Supports: - vec \* vec (component-wise) - vec \* float (scalar multiplication) - float \* vec (scalar multiplication) - float \* float

For matrix multiplication, use TransformNode instead.
